full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 13 of 228 689 LC2Qmax1 Kane - Direct Q. Every piece of information on this form? A. That I do not know. Q. What you told the government when you interviewed with them is that your school traditionally may verify things like the contact information or the student's name, correct? A. That is correct. Q. You don't know whether other information contained on the form is accurate, correct? A. I do not. Q. And no one at your school knows whether or not, for example, the person who is represented to refer the student to the school was an accurate representation of the referral, correct? A. I do not have that knowledge. Q. You do not know whether the financial responsibility information the person listed there is accurate, correct? A. I do not have that knowledge. Q. The school doesn't maintain records as of today about who actually paid for the student to go to the school, correct? A. No, we do not. Q. So you don't even have a way to verify some of the information contained in this form as you sit here today, correct? A. That is correct. MS. MENNINGER: Your Honor, with that record, the SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012298
